name: Senior QA Engineer (Python)
description:
Greenscreens.ai is a SaaS platform that delivers pricing predictions for freight brokerage companies operating in the US truckload spot market. The platform provides target rate, intelligence in buy and sell-side market and business insights to help freight brokers grow and protect their margins. We combine the power of aggregated market data and broker’s historical data with advanced machine learning techniques to deliver short-term predictive freight market pricing specific to your company's individual buying and selling behavior

As an Lead QA engineer you well be responsible for development for tests for old and new functionality. Development and maintenance of the current test infrastructure. Code review. Support for developers in resolving critical situations

You will work closely with our US team, Lithuania team, and customers to develop features that help shape the logistics and supply chain industry. You should be passionate about technology and well versed with new technologies and global best practices

Responsibilities

  • Test scenarios development for old and new functionality
  • Regression testing
  • Performance testing
  • Test automation / writing autotests
  • Code review
  • Testing documentation
Skills
  • Mindfulness and curiosity
  • Experience in testing web applications (4+ years)
  • Experience in web application automation both E2E scripts and API / integration (2+ years)
  • Python (versions >=3.6 and 2.7)
  • Ability to read and understand Java and JS code
  • Experience with performance testing tools (Yandex.Tank, JMeter)

  • Allure Test Report

  • Experience with logging and monitoring systems (Kibana, Grafana, Prometheus)
  • Knowledge of SQL at the query level for fetching from the database / preparing test data
  • Git (know about reverts, rebase, etc., and not be limited to commit / push)
  • Experience with Docker and CI / CD pipelines

We offer:

  • Remote work
  • Options in a fast growing startup
  • Salary in Euro
